::Havotron/Dreadwing/Needlenose::

Havotron heard the transmission. "Bring him here , Dreadwing."

"Yes Master"

Havotron then turned to look at Needlenose and Spinister. "Prepare to 
leave. Gather the rest and meet at the Contructicon site.  If they 
are not done we will destroy them. Understand?"

Needlenose looked to Spinister not knowing what to answer.

Dreadwind led Scavener to the spot that Havotron was....

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Scavenger::
> 
> Scavenger closes his eyes as Dreadwind sped to the D.E.D base. Once 
> there he wriggles out and lands on the ground, shaking his head and 
> looking around. He hears the transmission and prepares a report on 
> the ship in his head.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::Dreadwind::
> > Dreadwind extends arms and grabs Scavenger. Then in a burst of 
> speed 
> > is out of sight and lands at the base. "Lord Havotron, I have a 
> > speaker from the Contructicons.  He has a report on the ship."
